job.name: Web Language Model
job.description: Contact us for the implementation of this Workflow: contact@activeeon.com Microsoft Web Language Model API is a REST-based cloud service providing state-of-the-art tools for natural language processing. Using this API, your application can leverage the power of big data through language models trained on web-scale corpora collected by Bing in the EN-US market.
